short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View youtube thumbnails, Move 1 frame at a time through a YouTube video and take a screenshot, Make your youtube awesome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⭐ View youtube thumbnails with a single click.
⭐ Take a screenshot of any YouTube video with one click.
⭐ Change a playback speed from 0.25x to infinity.
⭐ Move 1 frame at a time through a YouTube video
